clauses.title: Pet Care Services
clauses.body: The Pet Sitter agrees to provide care for the following pets: [service_or_property] during the period of [term]. Services include: [feeding schedule, exercise, medication administration if needed]. The Pet Sitter shall follow the Owner's care instructions and maintain the pet's routine.

clauses.title: Compensation
clauses.body: The Owner shall pay $[fee] for the pet care services, payable [payment termsâ€”e.g., 50% deposit, balance before service]. Additional charges may apply for extra services, last-minute bookings, or holiday periods. Payment is due in full before service commencement unless otherwise agreed.

clauses.title: Care Instructions
clauses.body: The Owner shall provide: detailed care instructions; adequate food/supplies; veterinary contact; and emergency authorization. The Pet Sitter shall: follow care instructions; maintain pet safety; provide updates; and contact Owner for authorization before non-emergency veterinary care.

clauses.title: Emergency Care and Liability
clauses.body: In emergency, the Pet Sitter may seek veterinary care, with costs borne by Owner. The Pet Sitter carries pet care insurance but is not liable for incidents beyond reasonable control, pre-existing conditions, or pet behavioral issues. The Owner is responsible for veterinary costs and should ensure pets are properly vaccinated.

clauses.title: Cancellation
clauses.body: Cancellations with [number] days notice receive full refund; [number-7] days receive 50% refund; later cancellations receive no refund. The Pet Sitter may terminate if pets pose safety risks. The Owner may terminate for poor service with refund for unused days.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.body: This agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
